black_silent.desc: This slide rail features a three-section design, ensuring smooth sliding experience, suitable for various cabinet doors.

technical.description: Our stainless steel hinges utilize advanced engineering design and precision manufacturing processes. Each component undergoes strict quality control to ensure product durability and stability.
features: High-strength stainless steel material with strong corrosion resistance
Precision machining ensures perfect fit of each component
Innovative design achieves silent and smooth operation

about.title: About Guangdong Remon Hardware Industrial Co., Ltd.
about.content1: Guangdong Remon Hardware Industrial Co., Ltd., established in 1986, is a professional enterprise specializing in the research and development, production, and sales of furniture hardware accessories. Since its establishment, we have always adhered to the philosophy of 'Quality First, Innovation Development,' committed to providing high-quality products and excellent service to our customers.
about.content2: We possess advanced production equipment and a professional technical team, with products covering multiple series including slide rails and hinges. Through continuous technological innovation and process improvement, our products have won a good reputation in the market.
about.content3: The company focuses on product quality management and has established a comprehensive quality control system. We look forward to establishing long-term cooperative relationships with you, developing together, and creating the future.
